      • patchCommandLine

        protected void patchCommandLine(RunConfigurationBase configuration,
                                RunnerSettings runnerSettings,
                                GeneralCommandLine cmdLine,
                                java.lang.String runnerId)
                         throws ExecutionException
        Description copied from class: RunConfigurationExtensionBase
        Patches the command line of the process about to be started by the underlying run configuration.
        Specified by:
        patchCommandLine in class RunConfigurationExtensionBase<RunConfigurationBase<?>>
        Parameters:
        configuration - the underlying run configuration.
        runnerSettings - the runner-specific settings.
        cmdLine - the command line of the process about to be started.
        runnerId - the ID of the ProgramRunner used to start the process.
        Throws:
        ExecutionException - if there was an error configuring the command line and the execution should be canceled.

      • isEnabledFor

        public boolean isEnabledFor(RunConfigurationBase applicableConfiguration,
                            RunnerSettings runnerSettings)
        Specified by:
        isEnabledFor in class RunConfigurationExtensionBase<RunConfigurationBase<?>>
        Parameters:
        applicableConfiguration - Applicable run configuration
        Returns:
        True if extension is turned on in configuration extension settings. E.g. RCov is turned on for given run configuration.
